column5: hit a central divider and overturned her car at 1:30 am Sunday
column8: along Russian Federation Blvd.------According to the source
column9: before the incident the woman was driving a luxury Bentley
column11: at high speeds.------After hitting the concrete and flipping
column12: the woman was briefly trapped inside
column13: but was not seriously injured.------After the incident
column14: local authorities contacted traffic experts to take away the vehicle. ------POST NEWS------*A CNE motor expert estimates the car could be worth around $700k (if import duties and various taxes have been paid in full).
